import React from 'react' import Box from '@mui/material/Box' import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import Fade from '@mui/material/Fade' import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap' const style = { position: 'absolute', top: '50%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', width: 400, bgcolor: 'background.paper', border: '2px solid #000', boxShadow: 24, p: 4, } const ReusableModel = (props) => { return (
{props.modalTitle && {props.modalTitle}} {props.children} {props.buttons ? ( props.buttons.map((btn, index) => ( )) ) : ( )} {/*
{props.modelName} { props.children }
*/}
) } export default ReusableModel
